Race.SpecificTitle: PW Health Unit -- 2.56 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of two and fifty-six hundredths (2.56) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $862,912) on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purposes of furnishing the Parish's portion of funds to maintain and operate the Vermilion Parish Health Units, and constructing, acquiring, maintaining and operating a rabies and animal control program and facilities for the Parish, said millage to represent a six hundredths of a mill (.06) increase over the 2-1/2 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on February 9, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sub-Road Dist. No. 3 of Road Dist. No. 2 -- 8.60 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sub-Road District No. 3 of Road District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Sub-Road District No. 3 of Road District No. 2 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of eight and sixty hundredths (8.60) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $284,540) on all property subject to taxation in the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of maintaining the roads in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 2 -- 8.05 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Gravity Drainage District No. 2 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of eight and five hundredths (8.05) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $344,850 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating drainage works for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Coulee Kinney Drainage Dist. -- 15 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Coulee Kinney Drainage District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Coulee Kinney Drainage District of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $835,575 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, and maintaining the District's drainage works?
